content: measurements width at top approx 152 cm / 59 ¾ length mid back approx 74 cm / 29 1/8 materials drops alpaca from garnstudio 250 g color no 1101 white drops crochet hook size 3 mm / us c or size needed to obtain the correct gauge crochet gauge width of 6 diamonds x height of 10 diamonds = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
